content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to study with full focus on #{selected_days}, starting from today until #{auto_destruct}, between #{time_range}.

I will begin with #{initialFocusGoal} minutes of study each day and increase it by #{incrementFocusGoalBy} minutes daily until I reach my goal of #{finalFocusGoal} hours.

During these sessions, all apps will be blocked except the ones I’ve marked as allowed: #{unrestrictedApps}.

If I break this focus or use restricted apps, I accept the consequences set in this quest.

This is my promise to myself — to stay consistent, grow my discipline, and level up my brain. 📖🚀

basicQuest.title: Study Focus
basicQuest.instructions:
### 🚀 Study

> **You’re not just studying. You’re building a future where you don’t have to settle.**
> Every minute you focus, you **sharpen your mind into a weapon**.
> Every chapter you master, you **silence that voice** that said *you can't*.

---

You’re **not behind** — you’re in the **grind**.
And the grind is where **legends are made**. 🛠️

So:

* 🧘 Breathe.
* 💪 Sit up.
* 📖 Open that book like it’s the **map to everything you want** — because it is.

You have **everything it takes**.
You just have to **prove it to yourself**.

---

### 🔥 Let’s go.

**No distractions. No doubts. Just *you* vs *yesterday’s you*.**
And spoiler:

## **You win. 🎯**
